name: Hugleberry Corp.
overview:
Hugleberry provides users with scientific real-time data about a locations’s or product’s sustainability, depending on lifestyle and eco requirements. A personal compass carries your local sustainable lifestyle and shares this with others in your area.

The platform embodies social commerce, local, mobile and sustainability, and it’s backed by a robust but innovative, academically sound index of sustainability that will include data on tens of thousands of products to lead you to the more planet friendly things nerby.

The Magic: People can share their compass with others. This raises their “personal value” and helps others to see through their eyes and discover new things – fitting their eco requirements and lifestyle.

Cities and brands will use the Hugleberry digital ecosystem to leverage real–time inventory for mobile activation, while our Big Data helps companies to understand consumers. Social Smart Ads help to engage with the audience.
